abstract.p: PaineWebber maintains buy recommendation on Priceline.com stock; its 12-month target price is $15, down from $125 (S)

block.p: PaineWebber has named its own price for Priceline.com, and it is a mere fraction of the previous target.

Priceline, which asks users to bid on products and services, warned last week that its third-quarter revenue would fall below market expectations because of weak airline ticket sales. But PaineWebber has maintained its ''buy'' recommendation on the stock. Only now, its 12-month target price is $15, down from $125. It closed on Friday at $11.88.
